name: Composite ID Number And Name
description:
A field identifying a person both as a coded value and with a text name.  For specific fields, individual sites may elect to omit the ID or the name

Example:
|12372^RIGGINS^JOHN^""^""^""^MD^ADT1| 
|12372^^^^^^^ADT1| 
|^RIGGINS^JOHN^""^""^""^MD|

fields.name: ID Number
fields.description: Coded ID according to a user-defined table, defined by the 8th component.  If the first component is present, either the source table or the assigning authority must be valued

fields.name: Suffix
fields.description: Used to specify a name suffix (e.g., Jr. or III).

fields.name: Prefix
fields.description: Used to specify a name prefix (e.g., Dr.).

fields.name: Degree
fields.description: Used to specify an educational degree (e.g., MD).

fields.name: Source Table
fields.description: Refer to user-defined table 0297 - CN ID source  for suggested values.  Used to delineate the first component
